duties_responsibilities.duty: Meet and exceed sales quotas by driving sales in IT Infrastructure Solutions and/or Managed IT Services.
Develop territory and cross-sell IT services to clients.
Discuss business solutions with all levels of client leadership.
Overcome objections and emphasize positive, future-oriented perspectives in sales conversations.
Apply technical knowledge and experience to individual customer needs.
Coordinate multiple sales activities and manage multiple client solutions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
